name: No Block Glow
description: Removes object glow when placing objects into the editor.

no-glow.name: No Glow
no-glow.description: Automatically enables No Glow on all placed objects.

dont-fade.name: Don't Fade
dont-fade.description: Automatically enables Don't Fade on all placed objects.

dont-enter.name: Don't Enter
dont-enter.description: Automatically enables Don't Enter on all placed objects.
